animeTitle: I Was Forced by the System to Become a Villain
otherNames: Zhengyi De Wo Bei Xitong Bi Cheng Da Fanpai, As a Righteous Person I Was Forced by the System to Become a Villain, I Was Forced by the System to Become a Villain, Zhèngyì De Wǒ Bèi Xìtǒng Bī Chéng Dà Fǎnpài, 正义的我被系统逼成大反派, 正义的我被系统逼成了大反派,
synopsis: After transmigrating and becoming Lin Bei, the second senior brother of Qingyun Sect’s Lingxi Peak, he resolved to be a good person. However, he gets entangled with a system that specifically cultivates super villains. Lin Bei is forced to go against his original intention, turning into a major villain to compete with the numerous chosen ones across the Jiuzhou continent for fortune, all while trying to save his own life.
